EmailTemplate.name: 18-GEPS TO-Partner-Email-Operational-T001OY.21375.Email - AirScale price update
EmailTemplate.subject: AirScale Wi-Fi Partner Product Price Catalogs update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> AirScale Wi-Fi Partner Product Price Catalogs update Dear Nokia Partners,
On 23rd January 2018, Nokia updated the AirScale Wi-Fi Partner Product Price Catalog which also includes Equipment BoM Quotation Tab, and Wi-Fi CARE services calculator.
How to access your price books:
- Nokia PRM Partner Portal <[[https://nokia.lightning.force.com/lightning/page/home]]> Click on the Nokia PRM Partner Portal link and follow the path as indicated: [Account → Details → Personal space links → Partner Pricing folders]
Key Highlights
- The price book has been created using AirScale Wi-Fi pricing tool PPLDec2017-ed15-it1. - It includes updated hardware and software according to partner released products list:
- Improved AirScale Wi-Fi product pricing aligning market feedback. - Updated AirScale CARE / Maintenance Services price calculator v0.19 provided as standalone xls file: “WIFI_Care_Calculator_v019_INDIR[1] Euro.xls”. - AirScale Wi-Fi Ordering [Configuration] guidelines were made available on Partner Portal/Partner Tools page <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/article/Tools]]> - “AirScale Wi-Fi Warranty and Maintenance Conditions [scope of work]” and “Wi-Fi controller as a Service Scope of Work” were made available on the Partner Portal /Distribution Program page <[[https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/article/Program-Distribution]]>
Product Notifications:
- To receive notifications on product updates, manufacture discontinued dates and other product status changes, please subscribe to Notifications in OLCS (Nokia’s on-line customer support website). - To receive notifications on partner price catalog updates, please subscribe to Notifications in Partner Portal/Partner Personal space. - Next update is planned for May 2018.
For more information:
Pricing information is available on Nokia PRM Partner Personal folder.
Please contact your Nokia partner sales manager should you have any questions.
Bogdan Vasilescu Nokia Global Partner Program and Sales Team Connect with us ©{{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia | Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
